DOC.brief_summary: We analyze the effects of combined intramuscular and intraarterial transplantation of BMCs in patients with PAD. BMCs were transplanted into the ischemic limb. After 2 and 13 months walking distance and perfusion indices were monitored.
DOC.brief_title: Novel Therapy of PAD by Combined Transplantation of BMCs
DOC.criteria: severe limb ischemia infectious disease cancer
